headline: Theron, Perez And Hayek Might Testify About Weinstein
abstract: Several celebrities were among those who might be mentioned or might testify at the rape trial of Harvey Weinstein, a judge said.
lead_paragraph: The actresses Salma Hayek, Rosie Perez and Charlize Theron were among the people that a judge said on Tuesday might be called as witnesses or mentioned in testimony during the rape trial of the movie producer Harvey Weinstein.
